attributes.action: For secondary schools when they have PSHE days, to focus more on mental health.
attributes.additional_details: In the last 5 years, teenagers with mental health issues/problems has rose dramatically.
attributes.background: In the past, I have felt that secondary schools aren't doing enough about mental health and addressing it properly. They tend to focus on having all government related issues on PSHE days.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition in its current form as it does not include a clear action for either the UK Government or Parliament. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition about mental health awareness in schools. 

Alternatively, you might like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119426
